EmailTemplate.description: To be used to educate customer on how to create a new account on Markit Hub platform
EmailTemplate.name: Markit Hub new account
EmailTemplate.subject: Markit Hub new account
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for contacting Customer Care at IHS Markit.
To access Markit Hub, please visit www.markithub.com and complete the registration form. Once complete, you will automatically receive your login credentials to your registered email address.
To get access to <research provider's> research via Markit Hub, please send an email to each entitlement firm's support team requesting them to enable their content for your profile. Please also copy in that email, a sales sponsor (your contact person in the bank whose research you wish to access).
If you require any further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact us.
Kind regards, {!Case.OwnerFullName} IHS Markit | Customer Care
